content: aapeli the curious creature materials aran weight yarn g hook 4mm stuffing pipe cleaner about 7cm safety eyes size height 14cm 5 5 inches abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase 2 single crochets in 1 stitch decrease = decrease crochet 2 stitches together chain = chain you can find a good tutorial of magic_ring from here http //www hookandneedles com/2008/03/22/amigurumi-tutorial-1/ notes you can make different facial expressions to aapeli by shaping its mouth and ears/antlers though this may depend on the yarn please do not sell or repost this pattern © amoena & j-r 2008 1 3 head & body starting from the head 6 single_crochet with magic_ring r1 single_crochet around -> 6 stiches r2 increase around -> 12 r3-r9 single_crochet around x7 ->12 r10 decrease three times single_crochet in the rest of the stitches -> 9 push the mouth in by using your finger as seen in the picture sew one or two stitches to secure insert eyes and stuff the decreases in row 10 and 11 form the back of the neck i wanted to make sure the eyes are nicely positioned so i crocheted the next two row placed the eyes and unraveled the row to have enough space to attach the washers you can do the same if you are unsure about the position of the eyes r11 decrease twice single_crochet in the rest of the stitches -> 7 r12 single_crochet 4 increase increase single_crochet -> 9 r13-r22 single_crochet around x10 r23 single_crochet 6 increase 3 -> 12 r24 single_crochet 7 increase 4 single_crochet 1 -> 16 r25 *increase single_crochet repeat from * around -> 24 r26 single_crochet around r27 *increase single_crochet single_crochet repeat from * around -> 32 r28-r32 single_crochet around x5 r33 *decrease single_crochet single_crochet repeat from * around -> 24 r34 *decrease single_crochet repeat from * around -> 18 r35 *decrease single_crochet repeat from * around -> 12 stuff r36 decrease around -> 6 finish off cut the yarn and pull through the loop legs x4 5 single_crochet with magic_ring r1 increase around -> 10 r2-r5 single_crochet around x4 cut the yarn leaving long tail for sewing and pull it through the loop big wings x2 ch7 r1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet around the starting chain -> 14 r2-r4 single_crochet around x3 r5 *decrease single_crochet single_crochet repeat from * around -> 10 r6 *single_crochet decrease repeat from * around -> 7 r7 single_crochet around cut the yarn leaving long tail for sewing and pull it through the loop please do not sell or repost this pattern © amoena & j-r 2008 2 3 small wings x2 ch4 r1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet around the starting chain -> 8 r2-r4 single_crochet around x3 r5 *decrease single_crochet single_crochet repeat from * around -> 6 cut the yarn leaving long tail for sewing and pull it through the loop ears/antlers x2 ch6 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet to the beginning of the chain ch1 turn
